Translations.Text: Gongji chaojin zhe yi yinliao, bing guanli jin si de ren, yu quexin zhenzhu he mori, bing wei zhenzhu er fendou de ren, nimen yiwei ta lia shi yiyang de ma? Zai zhenzhu kan lai, bici bushi xiangdeng de. Zhenzhu shi bu yindao bu yi de minzhong de.
Xindao erqie qianju, bing jie ziji de caichan he shengming wei zhu dao er fendou zhe, zai zhenzhu kan lai, shi pinji geng gao de; zhe deng ren jiushi chenggong de.
Tamen de zhu yi ziji de ci'en, xiyue he leyuan xiang tamen baoxi, tamen jiang zai leyuan li xiangshou yongheng de en
er yong ju qizhong. Zai zhenzhu nali que you zhongda de baochou.
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen buyao yi ziji de fuxiong wei baohu ren, ruguo tamen qi zhengxin er qu mixin dehua. Nimen zhong shei yi tamen wei baohu ren, shei shi bu yi zhe.

Ni shuo: Ruguo nimen yiwei ziji de fuqin, erzi, xiongdi, qizi, qinqi, yiji nimen de lai de caichan, shengpa zhixiao de shengyi, he xin'ai de zhuzhai, bi zhenzhu ji qi shizhe he wei zhenzhu er fendou geng wei ke'ai, na nimen jiu dengdaizhuo, zhidao zhenzhu zhixing ta de mingling ba. Zhenzhu shi bu yindao fangsi de minzhong de.

Xuduo zhanchang shang he hou nai yin zhi yi, zhenzhu que yi yuanzhu nimen. Dangshi, nimen zikua ren zhong, dan renshu sui zhong, dui nimen que wu biyi; dimian sui guang, dan nimen juede wudizirong, zhongyu baibei.
Houlai, zhenzhu ba ningjing jiang yu qi shizhe he xinshimen, bing jiangxia nimen suo wei jian de jundui, ta cheng zhi liao buxindao zhe, na shi bu xindao zhe de baochou.
Houlai, ta zhunxu tasuo yiyu zhe huiguo zi xin. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.

Xindao de renmen a! Yi wu pei zhu zhe zhishi wuhui, gu cong jinnian qi bu zhun tamen linjin jin si; ruguo nimen weiju pinkun, namo, zhenzhu jiang yi ta de enhui shi nimen manzu, ruguo ta yiyu. Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi de, que shi zhi rui de.

Dang dikang bu xin zhenzhu he mori, bu zun zhenzhu ji qi shizhe de jielu, bu feng zhenjiao de ren, ji ceng shou tian jing de ren, nimen yao yu tamen zhandou, zhidao tamen yizhao ziji de nengli, gui guiju ju de jiaona ding shui.

Youtairen shuo: Ou zai er shi zhenzhu de erzi. Jidu jiaotu shuo: Mai xi ha shi zhenzhu de erzi. Zhe shi tamen xinkoukaihe, fangxiao congqian bu xindao zhe de kouwen. Yuan zhenzhu zuzhou tamen. Tamen zenme ruci fangdang ne!

Tamen she zhenzhu er ba tamen de boshi, senglu he mai er yan zhizi mai xi ha dangzuo zhuzai. Tamen suo feng de mingling zhishi chongbai du yi de zhuzai, chu ta zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Zansong zhenzhu chao hu tamen suoyong lai pei ta de!
Tamen wangxiang yong ziji de kou chui mie zhenzhu de guangming, dan zhenzhu zhi yuan fayang ziji de guangming, jishi bu xindao zhe bu yuanyi.
Ta ceng yi zhengdao he zhenjiao de shiming weituo ta de shizhe, yibian ta shi zhenjiao shengguo yiqie zongjiao, jishi yi wu pei zhu zhe bu yuanyi.
